text: 12.2 Plp 2.8, Hib 1.3, 1.13, 1 Pi 1.11, 3.22 Chɨn Jisas nop nokom nɨgɨnɨgun. Jisas nop gos lɨnopun ak, bɨ jɨj chɨn nɨm anɨb ak. Pen ne gos lɨnopun chɨn ak nɨŋɨd gek, gos lɨnopun anɨb ak kɨdek teplep yɨbɨl nep yenɨgab. Pen ne God agak ak gɨtep gɨl kɨdek genɨm, God gek kɨdek mɨdtep gɨl mɨñmɨñ tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨnɨgayn agɨl gos nɨgak. Anɨb ak yɨp mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lɨnɨgabal agɨl, gos awl ma nɨgak. Pen binɨb gos nɨgɨlak, Bɨ olap mab bak alaŋ chɨpɨl pak tɨbɨk lel kumub ak, ne bɨ tɨmel mɨdeb nebeŋ dup nɨgɨlak. Yɨp pen nebeŋ dɨnɨgab agɨl gos anɨb ma nɨŋɨd, monmon kumak. Anɨgek, amɨl God besɨgep ne ñɨn yɨpɨd kɨd okok ken besɨg mɨdeb.
